ngiemboon: Wetsɔ̌ nyìŋ ge tó yé pɔ́ ncwò nzem.
en: The other person will only come in the evening.

ngiemboon: Peg ka tè tó jǔɔ wɔ́
Peg ka tè tó jǔɔ wɔ́
en: it was the day before yesterday.

ngiemboon: á ka gwɔ̌ pɔ́ wetsɔ̌ júɔ.
á ka gwɔ̌ pɔ́ wetsɔ̌ júɔ.
en: it was the day before yesterday.

ngiemboon: Pi lɔɔn ńtó, pi júu wéwɛ̌ ńná né mèŋ.
en: If you arrive, buy this one to give to me.

ngiemboon: A gʉa na mvfó yɛ̀, wɛ̀ zɔ̌ fáŋ.
en: Among these goats, this is the one that is big.

ngiemboon: Ɔ̀ ge gʉa na menkáʼ mɔɔn, é jú wɛ̌?
en: Which of the following fields will you buy?

ngiemboon: À gɔ̌ɔn ngie à tè wó wɔ́.
en: He said he won't be there.

ngiemboon: Woo míŋ mbǎʼ nyìŋ oo! Tà à ge tsẅɛ́ɛ?
en: “Woo” someone else’s child! Will he get through it?

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n tǒŋo yé, á gɔɔn ngie woo.
en: I called him, he said yes.

ngiemboon: Wóo míŋ wɔ̀ɔn móo! Ɔ̀ nyě ńgʉe gʉe.
Wɔ́ pɔ̂! egubé nyé tè kwɔʼɔ́ sekúd páʼɔɔn é gwe nzyè.
en: “Wɔ́ pɔ̂”! The children are not always home from school, they can starve.
Call the man or the woman.

ngiemboon: Pɔ́ɔn lékaa mêngáb wɛ̂, kaa pɔ́ wɔɔn.
en: Don't wear that hen, just wear this one.

ngiemboon: Pɔ́ tsẅǐ ngie wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ néŋe ssé.
en: They asked everyone to sit down.
